backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing profiles, eligibility checks, photo uploads, and authorization using storage and access‑control mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old CommunityProfile records to the new format by adding the profilePhoto field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping profile‑photo‑related features to frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in routing, UI, and profile photo management.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme definitions providing light/dark butterfly‑themed styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and defining metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication and eligibility gating, and wraps authenticated routes in AppShell.
frontend/src/backendExtensions.d.ts: Extends backend TypeScript types with future post, comment, and report interfaces for the frontend.
frontend/src/components/auth/AgeGate.tsx: Age‑verification screen requiring users to confirm 18+ status before accessing community features.
Layout wrapper providing navigation, main content container, and a styled footer with dynamic year and external link.
frontend/src/components/nav/AuthedNav.ts: Authenticated navigation bar with links, admin-only moderation link, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages avatar and profile photo upload, preview, validation, removal, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth, exposing login state, principal, and a logout method that clears cached queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for loading, logging in, and maintaining Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for eligibility, profiles, directory browsing, contacts, and reporting actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Connections.tsx: Static placeholder page describing upcoming connections management features.
frontend/src/pages/Directory.tsx: Displays a searchable mentor directory with filtering and profile cards based on query results.
frontend/src/pages/Feed.tsx: Shows a placeholder community feed and a disabled post creation feature pending backend support.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Presents community guidelines in several themed cards outlining rules and expectations.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with branding, introduction, feature highlights, and a login CTA.
frontend/src/pages/Moderation.tsx: Checks admin status and shows either an access-denied message or a placeholder moderation panel.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetail.tsx: Placeholder page indicating post details and comments will be added once backend is ready.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileMe.tsx: User profile editor that loads, displays, and updates community profile data with form controls.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileView.tsx: Renders a user profile page with avatar, profile details, optional photos, and a connect button using query hooks for profile data and contact actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and enabled plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s high-level state, feature list, and metadata for the Butterfly Connections platform.
